title: Roma strike late to beat Athletic as nine-man Lazio win at Plzen
description: Eldor Shomurodov scored in stoppage time as Roma earned a 2-1 win at home to Athletic Bilbao in the first leg of their Europa League last-16 tie on Thursday. The Serie A side went the closest to scoring through Artem Dovbyk and Paulo Dybala, who hit the woodwork, in a first half where chances were […] The post Roma strike late to beat Athletic as nine-man Lazio win at Plzen appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Chelsea captain James a midfielder for me, says Maresca
description: Chelsea coach Enzo Maresca said he considers Reece James a midfielder after the Blues captain scored in their 2-1 win at Copenhagen in the Conference League last 16. After a forgettable first half, James scored with a shot from distance to break the deadlock in the first leg before Enzo Fernandez doubled Chelsea’s lead.
